heading: Adoption
paragraph: Why are you are looking for a pure bred, when our pets come vaccinated, neutered and ready to love FOR FREE. Why would you go anywhere else?

heading: Animal Rescue
paragraph: For animals in critical condition, they are treated at our clinic and heal at our recovery center. Car accidents, wire traps, and skin diseases are the main issues we see daily.

heading: Human Education
paragraph: We visit schools and villages to educate them about rabies and compassion towards animals. The goal is to have the community as our partner in caring for the street animals.

heading: Street Animal Feeding
paragraph: We feed street dogs in need and support local street animal feeders. The program helps eliminate the human/street dog conflict and allows for easier catching, and monitoring animal health.
